PackageOracle.name: DA_SETTOP_BOX_ACCESS
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SETTOP_BOX_ACCESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.17.805955000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_id IN NUMBER
,settop_box_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_settop_box_access;

body.name: DA_SETTOP_BOX_ACCESS
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SETTOP_BOX_ACCESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.17.816564000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_access.add(fx), parms=' || settop_box_mac_address_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_settop_box_access a
(
a.settop_box_id
,a.settop_box_mac_address_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_settop_box_id.NEXTVAL
,add.settop_box_mac_address_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.settop_box_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_access.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_access.add, parms=' || settop_box_mac_address_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_settop_box_access a
(
a.settop_box_id
,a.settop_box_mac_address_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_settop_box_id.NEXTVAL
,add.settop_box_mac_address_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_access.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_id IN NUMBER
,settop_box_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_access.add, parms=' || settop_box_id || '|' || settop_box_mac_address_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_settop_box_access a
(
a.settop_box_id
,a.settop_box_mac_address_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.settop_box_id
,add.settop_box_mac_address_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_access.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,settop_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_settop_box_access.del, parms=' || settop_box_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_settop_box_access a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.settop_box_id = del.settop_box_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_settop_box_access.del');

END del;

END da_settop_box_access;
